name: Bubble Memory Sequence
description:
Test and sharpen your power of short term memory now.

Watch the bubbles light up and then click on the bubbles to repeat the same sequence using your memory. It is a great way to practice and improve your short term memory.

Feature:
Game Center leaderboards.
Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch.
